class one_page_calendar.model.Cardinal(value)

Bases: Enum

A Enum to represent the ordinals from First to Fourth, plus a value to represent All

class one_page_calendar.model.Day(value)

Bases: Enum

An Enum to represent the days of the week

class one_page_calendar.model.Month(value)

Bases: Enum

An Enum to represent the months of the year, plus a NoMonth value

class one_page_calendar.model.OnePageCal(year: int)

Bases: object

This class implements a calendar that covers an entire year within a single concise representation, which consists of three grids: a Month grid, a Day of the Week grid, and a Day of the Month grid. The latter two are invariant from year to year. The month grid is built starting with the day of week of the January 1st for a given year. These grids are related as follows: the columns of the Month grid and the Day of the Week grid are aligned and the rows of the Day of the Month grid and the Day of the Week grid are aligned. Each month is

static dom_rows()

This method returns the rows of the Day of the Month grid

Returns

yields the rows of the Day of the Month grid one row at a time

Return type

np.array

doms_for_dow(month: Month, dow: Day) → list[int]

This method returns the days of the month within the specified Month that the specified Day of the Week falls

Parameters

  • month (one_page_calendar.model.Month) – The specified Month

  • dow (one_page_calendar.model.Day) – The specified Day of the week

Returns

a list containing the days of the month as described above

Return type

list[int]

This method returns the Day the corresponds to the specified Month and day of month

Parameters

  • dom (int) – the specified day of the month

Returns

mo_col_idx(month: Month) → int

This method returns the column index to which the specified Month was assigned by the set_month method.

Parameters

month (one_page_calendar.model.Month) – The month whose column index will be returned

Returns

the column index

Return type

int

month_rows()

This method returns the rows of the Month grid

Returns

yields the rows of the Month gris one row at a time

Return type

np.array

set_month(dow: Day, month: Month)

This method places a Month value in the appropriate cell of the Month grid. The column index is derived from the Day value that corresponds to the Months first day and the row index is the first row within the column that has not had a Month assigned to it.

Parameters

  • dow (one_page_calendar.model.Day) – The day of the week of the first day of the specified month

  • month (one_page_calendar.model.Month) – The month to be placed in the Month grid

Returns

None

class one_page_calendar.model.OnePageCalBase

Bases: object

This class provides methods that are used in the __init__ method of the OnePageCal class

static build_dom_grid()

This method builds the Day of the Month grid as a numpy array of integers with a shape of (7, 5). The series proceeds in a column-wise order

Returns

the Day of the Month grid

Return type

numpy.array

static build_dow_grid()

This method builds the Day of the Week grid as a numpy array of Day enums with a shape of (7,7). The day sequence proceeds in a column-wise order.

Returns

the Day of the Week grid

Return type

numpy.array

class one_page_calendar.model.OnePageCalFactory

Bases: object

A factory class used to create a OnePageCal instance for a given year

static for_year(year: int) → OnePageCal

This method should be used to create instances of OnePageCal rather than invoking the class’ __init__ method directly.

Parameters

year (int) – the year to be used in creating the OnePageCal instance

Returns

a OnePageCal instance for the specified year

Return type

one_page_calendar.model.OnePageCal
